alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northern Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Minatare, or 12 miles northeast of Scottsbluff, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Alliance, Gering, Terrytown, Minatare, Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte, Lake Minatare Campground, Alliance Airport, Angora, Kilpatrick Lake, Berea, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Minatare and Lake Alice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
